mapper.select: SELECT t3.id,user_name,user_pass,name,authority,course_name FROM( SELECT t1.id,user_name,user_pass,name,authority,course_id FROM( SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_name = #{userName} )t1 JOIN class t2 ON t1.class_id=t2.class_id )t3 JOIN course t4 ON t3.course_id = t4.course_id
